sentences.en: A bullet goes from this gun with a velocity of 3000 feet per second.
sentences.cn: 此枪射出的子弹,其速度为每秒3000英尺.

sentences.en: Acceleration and velocity are both vectors.
sentences.cn: 加速度和速度都是矢量。

sentences.en: Amplifier self - oscillates at a frequency depending on the velocity of the fluid.
sentences.cn: 放大器自激振荡的频率就取决于流体的速度.

sentences.en: Einstein's theory links energy with mass and velocity of light.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦的理论把能量同质量和光速联系起来.

sentences.en: In the earth's interior there are similar channels or low - velocity layers.
sentences.cn: 在地球的内部有相似的通道或低速层.

sentences.en: Martinez had good velocity on his fastball.
sentences.cn: 马丁内斯的快球速度极快。

sentences.en: Normally the shear velocity is about half of the compressional velocity.
sentences.cn: 一般地说横波速度大约是纵波速度的一半.

sentences.en: Reflectivity depends on the velocity and density of rocks.
sentences.cn: 反射能力取决于岩面的速度和密度.

sentences.en: Sometimes temporal fluctuation may take place inthe local velocity.
sentences.cn: 有时,在局部速度中可能出现瞬时脉动.

sentences.en: That is, the angular velocity is more than doubled.
sentences.cn: 即所得的末角速度大于原来的二倍.

sentences.en: The atomic particles resist being accelerated past the velocity of light.
sentences.cn: 这些原子粒子无法被加快到超过光速.

sentences.en: The hare darted off with the velocity of a bird.
sentences.cn: 野兔像鸟一样快速掠去.

sentences.en: The speedboat reached a velocity of 120 mph.
sentences.cn: 快艇的时速达到了120英里。

sentences.en: The study used relatively small values of superficial gas velocity.
sentences.cn: 这项研究采用相当小的表观气速.

sentences.en: The velocity of light is about 300000 kilometres per second.
They sediment toward the bottom of the centrifuge tube at a velocity.
sentences.cn: 它们以某一速度向管底方向沉降.

phrases.tran_cn: 粒子速度；质点（振动）速度

trans.tran_cn: 速率，速度，周转率，高速，快速
trans.tran_en: the speed of something that is moving in a particular direction
